docs.snippet: Oscar apparently has a thing, and always has, for white guys....
docs.lead_paragraph: The University of Southern California released a study yesterday about the preferences of the Academy and found that in almost in any given year of best picture nominations, the roles for people who are neither white nor male are few and far between.
docs.abstract: Oscar apparently has a thing, and always has, for white guys.

docs.snippet: An actor's daughter hits all the right notes....
docs.lead_paragraph: Over a year ago at Sundance, the Bagger saw Josh Radin playing at a small party and there was a woman behind him hitting all his notes and some of her own. Upon inquiry, the Bagger found out her name was Schulyer Fisk, who was then dating Mr. Radin. It turned out that she also had her own musical career, along with film and television work, including a role in "I'm Reed Fish."
docs.abstract: An actor's daughter hits all the right notes.

docs.snippet: Politics may be upstaging Hollywood this year, but Oscar-town is still ready to have some fun....
docs.lead_paragraph: The calendar year doesn't get much traction in many parts of Los Angeles. The Oscars is New Year's Eve and New Year's Day rolled into one, a single day of reckoning when accounts are tallied, blessings are counted and resolutions are forged anew.
docs.abstract: Politics may be upstaging Hollywood this year, but Oscar-town is still ready to have some fun.

docs.snippet: It's party-time in Hollywood, but a shadow still hangs over the festivities....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Bagger is a little long on material and a little short on space (and he thought the Interweb was infinite), so forgive him if he sounds like Liz Smith with a modem. O.K., here goes: The dinner after the opening at the Gagosian was thick with luminaries. Russell Simmons was there, as were Colin Callendar of HBO Films, his wife Elizabeth and Chris DeWolfe, the founder of MySpace. And that was just at the Bagger's table.
docs.abstract: It's party-time in Hollywood, but a shadow still hangs over the festivities.

docs.snippet: The end of the strike has alleviated the fears of more than a dozen blue-chip advertisers, worried that their marketing plans centered on the Oscars would be disrupted....
docs.lead_paragraph: The end of the strike has alleviated the fears of more than a dozen blue-chip advertisers, worried that their marketing plans centered on the Oscars would be disrupted.

headline.main: With Strike’s End, Oscars Regain Marketing Allure
headline.print_headline: With Strike’s End, Oscars Regain Marketing Allure

docs.snippet: An article on Monday about Washington State’s presidential primary attributed an erroneous distinction to the state’s nominating system. Washington is one of several states that have both primaries and caucuses; it is not the only one....
docs.lead_paragraph: An article on Monday about Washington State’s presidential primary attributed an erroneous distinction to the state’s nominating system. Washington is one of several states that have both primaries and caucuses; it is not the only one.

docs.snippet: The Carpetbagger makes his predictions for the 80th Academy Awards....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Carpetbagger makes his predictions for the 80th Academy Awards.

docs.snippet: A film review last Friday about this year’s Oscar-nominated shorts misidentified the animation technique used in Aleksandr Petrov’s “My Love.” It was hand-drawn using oil paint on glass, not pastels....
docs.lead_paragraph: A film review last Friday about this year’s Oscar-nominated shorts misidentified the animation technique used in Aleksandr Petrov’s “My Love.” It was hand-drawn using oil paint on glass, not pastels.

docs.snippet: After the writers strike, ABC ramps up its Oscar promotion....

headline.main: Macho Guys Soften Up for Oscar

docs.snippet: From Yahoo: Officials at the U.S. Alzheimer's Association have called on Julie Christie and others to show some sensitivity towards the disease at the Academy Awards on Sunday. Christie, who is nominated for an Oscar for her portrayal of an Alzhei...
docs.abstract: From Yahoo: Officials at the U.S. Alzheimer's Association have called on Julie Christie and others to show some sensitivity towards the disease at the Academy Awards on Sunday. Christie, who is nominated for an Oscar for her portrayal of an Alzheimer's disease sufferer in "Away From Her," upset the organization last month when she made [...]
